Drive_Bays:
RM23808 (3.5" Hot-swap)：8
                                                                    br
RM23808 (Slim ODD)：1
                                                                    br
RM23808 (Internal 2.5")：2
                                                                    br
RM23812 (3.5" Hot-swap)：12
                                                                    br
RM23824 (2.5" Hot-swap)：24
                                                                    br
Optional 2.5" (Hot-swap) for OS：2
                                                                    br
Expansion_Slots: 7 x Low Profile or 3 x Full Height
HDD_Backplane: 12Gb/s Mini-SAS HD with or without Expander
Front_Control: Power On/Off, System Reset, UID, 1 x USB3.0 & 2 x USB3.0
Indicators: 1 x Power Status, 2 x LAN Activity, 1 x UID,1 x HDD Status, 1 x System status
Cooling_Fans: Middle: 3 x 80 mm (Up to 4), PWM (Hot-swap & Non Hot-swap)br
